meta.title: NewNew - Haz ofertas y vota decisiones ajenas
meta.description: Decide qué será lo siguiente que las personas harán con sus vidas. Vota, haz ofertas y coopera con la comunidad en NewNew para ver a personas hacer cosas en la vida real

title.biggest: Lo mejor de todos los tiempos

ac.title: Bids
ac.caption_NEED_TRANSLATION: Send creators custom bids and see if they choose yours.

mc.title: Superpolls
mc.caption_NEED_TRANSLATION: Vote on what a creator should do, then watch them do the option with the most amount of votes.

cf.title: Goals
cf.caption: Reúne dinero con otros para respaldar los objetivos de tus creadores favoritos. Si un número suficiente de personas respalda el Goal, verás cómo el creador lo realiza.

faq_NEED_TRANSLATION.title: FAQs
faq_NEED_TRANSLATION.learMore: Want to learn more? Visit <0>NewNew Support</0>

items.question: What is NewNew?
items.answer: NewNew is an interactive marketplace where you bid and vote on the outcomes of people’s lives. People make money letting others have a say in their life decisions.

items.question: Can I make money on NewNew?
items.answer: Yes! <0>Sign up to become a creator</0> and have people pay to vote and bid on your life decisions!

items.question: How do Bids work?
items.answer:
The audience sends you different bids on what you should do, and how much they’ll pay to see you do it.
You’ll choose your favorite bid and upload a video of yourself doing it! Don’t worry... you don’t have to choose the highest priced bid (but you can if you want to)! You can choose any bid you feel comfortable doing.

items.question: How do Superpolls work?
items.answer:
Post a video poll with different options for the audience to choose from.
People pay to vote on their favorite option and you upload a video of yourself doing the option that got the most votes!

items.question: What are Superpoll Bundles?
items.answer: Creators can offer discounted bundles for their Superpolls. Buying a bundle is optional, but with buying a bundle you get: <2>A big discount on votes + more voting power to use in upcoming Superpolls</2> <2>The ability to add your own custom option to the creator’s Superpolls</2> <2>1-on-1 messages with the creator</2>

items.question: What if the creator doesn’t do what was voted on or bid on?
items.answer: You won’t be charged if: <1>The creator never uploads a response video to a Superpoll or Bid</1> <1>The creator doesn’t choose your specific Bid</1> <1>The creator doesn’t choose the option you voted on in a Superpoll</1>
